article_html:
We’re happy to announce that Guardian Soulmates has won the UK Dating Award for “Daters’ Favourite Website”. 

This was an award by public vote, which means so much to us.

Thanks to everyone who voted for Soulmates. We’re happy and proud to offer a dating service where you can meet someone worth meeting.

With lots of love,

The Soulmates Team
x
authors: The Soulmates Team Guardian News Media
text:
We’re happy to announce that Guardian Soulmates has won the UK Dating Award for “Daters’ Favourite Website”.

This was an award by public vote, which means so much to us.

Thanks to everyone who voted for Soulmates. We’re happy and proud to offer a dating service where you can meet someone worth meeting.

title: Soulmates Wins Daters’ Favourite Award at UKDA
